definition: (of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Arcane makes up for that with mobility and mana.
sentences.chinese: 奧系提供的是更高的機動性和魔法值。

sentences.english: It's the ultimate electric wheelchair for the active outdoor user who still requires tight-quarter maneuverability.
sentences.chinese: 這種電動輪椅最終爲用戶增加戶外運動機動性。

sentences.english: The evaluation of tank's mobility is a typical multi-object decision problem.
sentences.chinese: 坦克機動性能的評估是一個典型的多目標決策問題。

sentences.english: It is important for fighter to have good maneuver ability in air combat.
sentences.chinese: 近距空戰要求新一代戰鬥機具有較好的機動性能。

sentences.english: However, it seems that OKN may alleviate OKI when low speed stimulus is used.
sentences.chinese: 在低速度視動刺激下，機動性眼震減輕了視動性錯覺。

sentences.english: We miss many occasions for serving because we lack sensitivity and spontaneity.
sentences.chinese: 我們常因敏銳度與機動性不夠而錯失很多事奉的時機。

sentences.english: Enjoy ride-on convenience and great maneuverability.
sentences.chinese: 享受乘坐上的便利和偉大的機動性。

sentences.english: This motorcycle is light, maneuverable , feels great, and is fun to ride.
sentences.chinese: 這摩托車輕，機動性，感覺很好，是有趣的旅程。

sentences.english: Tight turning radius ensuring an excellent manoeuvrability.
sentences.chinese: 緊湊的旋轉半徑提供了極好的機動性。

sentences.english: The fast maneuverability of radar is the crucial to win the battle on a field.
sentences.chinese: 雷達的快速機動性是保證在戰場上取勝的關鍵之一。

sentences.english: An unfixed lifestyle gives you the flexibility to switch between vertical and lateral every few years.
sentences.chinese: 而不固定的生活方式則能給你這個機動性。

sentences.english: The battalion's trafficability was essential in its victory.
sentences.chinese: 該營的機動性爲其獲勝的主要因素。

sentences.english: Having the self-loading and unloading capability on the military vehicle can improve greatly the maneuverability.
sentences.chinese: 整裝自卸車能有效提高軍用裝備的機動性。

sentences.english: Light metal track layers increased trafficability through the heavy ground.
sentences.chinese: 輕金屬覆層增加了車輛通過笨重路面時的機動性。

sentences.english: This tactic epitomizes speed and maneuverability over brute armor.
sentences.chinese: 這個戰術概括起來就是速度和機動性超越厚裝甲。
